Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Strong expression in the bone marrow and testis. Widely expressed. Weak expression in the ovarian stroma, but not expressed in the ovarian follicles. PTM
